me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.kinematics

Class RelativeMeccanumKinematics

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.kinematics.RelativeMeccanumKinematics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Kinematics<MeccanumState>

    public class RelativeMeccanumKinematics
extends java.lang.Object
implements Kinematics<MeccanumState>
    The most simple implementation of meccanum kinematics. For most use cases, this should suffice. If you need more advanced meccanum kinematics, this class isn't for you.
    Since:
    0.0.0
    Author:
    Colin Robertson
